item.title: Tour D'Afrique
item.description: Cairo to Capetown - Adventure #3. As retirement approached my Daughter Cary bought me the Lonely Planetâ€™s Epic Bike Rides of the World. A series of unlikely events convinced me that the improbably challenging trip from Cairo to Capetown was the one for me. Unfortunately this expedition was interrupted due to an injury for a few weeks. I was able to return to the...

item.title: Camino Frances | Oct and Nov 2018
item.description: Walking the Camino - Adventure #2. Walk from St. Jean Pied de Port in France to Santiago de Compostella in Spain. I started by myself on 21 October 2018. During the first 2 weeks we assembled a merry crew of pilgrims. For the last 2 weeks, it was a more solitary walk, occasionally shared with new friends for a day or two. Arrived in...
